Throughout the year, observe children &: Mo ngwageng ka moka, tlhokomedišiša bana & tsenye tše o di bonago.
Let's pretend you're tracking progress f: A re dire eke o lekola tšwelopele ya ngwana wa go bitšwa Themba. Thoma ka go tobetša fa!
You will be shown the right assessment f: O tla bontšhwa tekolo ya go swanela mengwaga ya ngwana.
Pretend that, while observing Temba, you: Dira eke, ge o tlhokomedišiša Themba, o bona gore o a myemyela. Araba ka go tobetša “Ee”!
Great!\n\n If you are not sure if Temba: Agaa! Ge o se na nnete ya gore Themba a ka dira se sengwe, o ka kgetha “Ga ke tsebe”
Some questions have pictures attached.\n: Dipotšišo tše dingwe di na le diswantšho go tšona.
Tap close to hide the picture and go bac: Tobetša tswalela go fihla seswantšho gomme o boele go selekodi sa tšwelopele.
You can always leave the progress tracke: O ka tloga go selokodi sa tšwelopele neng goba neng gomme wa boya go sona ka morago go feleletša. Dikarabo tša gago di tla bolokega. Tobetša fa.
When you have answered all the questions: Ge o arabile dipotšišo ka moka, o ka hlamela moabahlokomelo pego goba wa lebelela dikarabo tša gago gape.
You can see all of your completed report: O tla bona dipego ka moka tše o di dirilego letlakeleng la pegokgolo.
